content.raw:
Oh, I managed to miss @spielman's comment about units in spinboxes. That's a good idea, and actually something QSpinBoxes have functionality for, so it wouldn't be hard. But yes, seperate issue as it would be a change to the analog output widgets (which would then be reflected in the DDS widgets since they use them).

OK I'll do those things and then we can set this one down for now.
content.html:
Oh, I managed to miss @spielman's comment about units in spinboxes. That's a good idea, and actually something QSpinBoxes have functionality for, so it wouldn't be hard. But yes, seperate issue as it would be a change to the analog output widgets (which would then be reflected in the DDS widgets since they use them).

OK I'll do those things and then we can set this one down for now.
